<dialog height="506" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="279" top="4" width="420"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Parameters"><properties><entry name="text">Parameters</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties><combo dynamic="0" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SEARCH_CRITERIAs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Search criteria" tooltip="The selection criteria defines which type of entities (packages, files etc..) want to query. The option &UC4RB_SEARCH_BY_NAME# defines the name of the entity to look up." alt="1" filter="0" strict="1" vtype="i"><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command owner="_self" owneraction="setsource" ownerparam="src|_dialog@src"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptcombolist" target="_self" targetaction="setlist" wait="0"/><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC4_RV.PM_RPM.SEARCH_CRIT</entry><entry name="text">Search criteria</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_SEARCH_CRITERIAs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">The selection criteria defines which type of entities (packages, files etc..) want to query. The option &UC4RB_SEARCH_BY_NAME# defines the name of the entity to look up.</entry><entry name="dynamic">0</entry><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></combo><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SEARCH_BY_NAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Search by name" tooltip="Defines the name of the entity to look up. The entity may be a package, file, group etc (see parameter &UC4RB_SEARCH_CRITERIA#) for more details." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Search by name</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_SEARCH_BY_NAMEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Defines the name of the entity to look up. The entity may be a package, file, group etc (see parameter &UC4RB_SEARCH_CRITERIA#) for more details.</entry><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><combo dynamic="0" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_LIST_OPTIONs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="List Option" tooltip="Defines what to be listed for the matched entities (e.g. list all files of the queried package)." alt="1" filter="0" strict="1" vtype="i"><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command owner="_self" owneraction="setsource" ownerparam="src|_dialog@src"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptcombolist" target="_self" targetaction="setlist" wait="0"/><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC4_RV.PM_RPM.LIST_OPT</entry><entry name="text">List Option</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_LIST_OPTIONs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Defines what to be listed for the matched entities (e.g. list all files of the queried package).</entry><entry name="dynamic">0</entry><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></combo><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_OUTPUT_FORMATs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Output format " tooltip="An additional formatting string, which is passed to rpm using the --queryformat option. See for example http://linux.die.net/man/8/rpm for details how to use this option. If you leave this parameter empty, the --queryformat option is not generated. An additional formatting string, which is passed to rpm using the --queryformat option. See for example http://linux.die.net/man/8/rpm for details how to use this option. If you leave this parameter empty, the --queryformat option is not generated. Example: the following format string let you list the name, version and distribution platform for each package found in the query. '%{NAME}-%{VERSION} (platform: %{DISTRIBUTION})
'See http://www.rpm.org/max-rpm/ch-queryformat-tags.html for available query tags and their meanings.An additional formatting string, which is passed to rpm using the --queryformat option. See for example http://linux.die.net/man/8/rpm for details how to use this option. If you leave this parameter empty, the --queryformat option is not generated. Example: the following format string let you list the name, version and distribution platform for each package found in the query. '%{NAME}-%{VERSION} (platform: %{DISTRIBUTION})
'See http://www.rpm.org/max-rpm/ch-queryformat-tags.html for available query tags and their meanings. Example: the following format string let you list the name, version and distribution platform for each package found in the query. '%{NAME}-%{VERSION} (platform: %{DISTRIBUTION})
'See http://www.rpm.org/max-rpm/ch-queryformat-tags.html for available query tags and their meanings." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Output format </entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_OUTPUT_FORMATs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">An additional formatting string, which is passed to rpm using the --queryformat option. See for example http://linux.die.net/man/8/rpm for details how to use this option. If you leave this parameter empty, the --queryformat option is not generated.
An additional formatting string, which is passed to rpm using the --queryformat option. See for example http://linux.die.net/man/8/rpm for details how to use this option. If you leave this parameter empty, the --queryformat option is not generated.
Example: the following format string let you list the name, version and distribution platform for each package found in the query. '%{NAME}-%{VERSION} (platform: %{DISTRIBUTION})
'See http://www.rpm.org/max-rpm/ch-queryformat-tags.html for available query tags and their meanings.An additional formatting string, which is passed to rpm using the --queryformat option. See for example http://linux.die.net/man/8/rpm for details how to use this option. If you leave this parameter empty, the --queryformat option is not generated.
Example: the following format string let you list the name, version and distribution platform for each package found in the query. '%{NAME}-%{VERSION} (platform: %{DISTRIBUTION})
'See http://www.rpm.org/max-rpm/ch-queryformat-tags.html for available query tags and their meanings.
Example: the following format string let you list the name, version and distribution platform for each package found in the query. '%{NAME}-%{VERSION} (platform: %{DISTRIBUTION})
'See http://www.rpm.org/max-rpm/ch-queryformat-tags.html for available query tags and their meanings.</entry><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text></readpanel></dialog>
